## Install

```sh
pip3 install antpm
```

## Usage

```python
from antpm import AntPathMatcher
ant_matcher = AntPathMatcher()
res:bool = ant_matcher.match("t?st", "test")
```

## Run tests

```sh
python -m unittest -v .\tests\test_antpm.py
```
